results.text: You are a veritable wellspring of engineering knowledge. You have advantage on your next Engineering check.
You successfully devise a way to maximize your productivity. The amount of time it takes to complete the current task is reduced by [[/r 1d4]] minutes, hours, or days, whichever is relevant.
Youâ€™re remembering how sometimes disparate subjects fit together. You gain a temporary expertise die to an Engineering skill specialty for the next 24 hours.

You quickly calculate just the right way to lob an explosive to maximize its impact. The next time you use a thrown item (such as an acid vial, holy water, or blackpowder explosive), double its area of effect.
You quickly assess a structure, finding a point of weakness that can either be exploited or repaired to increase its stability.
Sometimes, all a contraption needs is a little push to get it going. You give a mechanical construct, trap, or structure a hard smack, instantly turning it on or causing it to work.
